TypeSignature.Value: public class ObjectQuery<T> : System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>, System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable<T>, System.Linq.IQueryable<T>

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectQuery`1<T> extends System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable, class System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable`1<!T>, class System.Linq.IQueryable, class System.Linq.IQueryable`1<!T>
Public Class ObjectQuery(Of T) Inherits ObjectQuery Implements IEnumerable(Of T), IOrderedQueryable(Of T), IQueryable(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class ObjectQuery : System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Linq::IOrderedQueryable<T>, System::Linq::IQueryable<T>

span.span: The entity type of the query.

summary.span: 表示在给定对象上下文中对概念模型的类型化查询。

span.span: Represents a typed query against a conceptual model in a given object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类表示一个查询，该查询返回由零个或多个特定类型的对象组成的集合。The generic class represents a query that returns a collection of zero or more objects of a specific type. 在执行对象查询之前，必须定义 。The must be defined before an object query can be executed. 此上下文提供了编写和执行查询所需的连接和元数据信息。This context provides the connection and metadata information that is required to compose and execute the query. 在以下方案中将执行对象查询：An object query is executed in the following scenarios: - 对其执行操作时，例如 `foreach` (C#) 或 `For Each` (Visual Basic) 枚举期间。When it is acted upon, such as during a `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) enumeration. - 分配用于填充 集合时。When it is assigned to fill a collection. - 显式调用 方法时。When the method is explicitly called. 查询本身可以使用一个 [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] 语句或 LINQ 查询进行创建，也可以使用类中包含的查询生成器方法以增量方式生成。The query itself can be created by using an [!INCLUDE[esql](~/includes/esql-md.md)] statement or a LINQ query, or it can be incrementally built by using the query builder methods included in the class. 在每种情况下，结果都为一个新 实例，该实例在显式执行或对其进行枚举时，会将查询发送到数据源进行执行并返回结果。In every case, the result is a new instance that, when explicitly executed or enumerated over, will send the query to the data source for execution and return the results. 通常是实体类型，也可以是 类型（用于匿名类型的投影）或基元类型（如整数或字符串）。An is frequently of an entity type, but it can also be of type, for projections to an anonymous type, or of a primitive type, such as an integer or string. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例演示如何构造 类的实例。The example shows how to construct an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以对 进行初始化，使之表示单个标量结果而不是标量结果集合。An can be initialized in such a way that it represents a single scalar result and not a collection of scalar results. 某些扩展方法要求使用集合结果作为输入。Some extension methods require collection results as input. 在这种情况下，当调用其中的一个方法时将引发 。In this case, an is thrown when one of these methods is called. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source. Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source. Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例演示如何构造 类的实例。The example shows how to construct an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你的应用程序生成在运行时的 Entity SQL 查询时，你应注意的数据源的任何命令长度限制。When your application generates Entity SQL queries at runtime, you should be aware of any command length limitations of the data source. Entity SQL 不会强制对查询中的命令文本的长度限制。Entity SQL does not enforce limitations on the length of the command text in queries. ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 以指定的查询、 和 进行初始化。The is initialized with the specified query, , and . summary.span: 将查询限制为唯一结果。

span.span: Limits the query to unique results.

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于应用了 [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此查询生成器方法返回等效于原始查询中使用的实例[SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md)应用。This query builder method returns an instance that is equivalent to the original query with [SELECT DISTINCT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) applied. `DISTINCT`运算符不能应用于数据源 （如 ntext) 中包括到非相应的列的映射的对象。The `DISTINCT` operator cannot be applied to an object that includes a mapping to a non-comparable column in the data source (such as ntext). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例使用 方法创建新的 对象。The example uses method to create a new object. 然后对新的 对象调用 ，以获取此查询的唯一结果。Then it calls on the new object to get the unique results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_unionall)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_unionall)]

span.span: Limits the query results by excluding results based on the results of another object query.

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于根据指定的 应用了 [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [EXCEPT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/except-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`query`用于定义要排除必须结果与兼容类型的相同类型或。The supplied `query` that defines results to exclude must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the . 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并实例。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 参数在组合后的 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 生成的查询从 实例（调用了它的 ）继承连接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例使用 方法创建新的 对象，然后循环访问新查询的结果。The example uses method to create a new object and then iterates through the result of the new query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Except](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_except)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Except](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_except)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象查询的默认合并选项为 。The default merge option for object queries is . 有关详细信息，请参阅[标识解析、 状态管理和更改跟踪](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例从 方法返回一个 。The example returns an from method. 然后，获取一个枚举器并循环访问查询结果。Then it gets an enumerator and iterates through the query results. 最后，释放枚举器和 对象。At the end it releases the enumerator and the object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryResult](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#queryresult)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryResult](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#queryresult)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用指定的映射`projection`参数。 applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter. 这意味着 方法返回的 始终具有类型 。This means that the returned by the method is always of type . 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此示例创建一个新的 对象，该对象包含现有查询的按产品名称分组的结果。This example creates a new object that contains the results of the existing query grouped by product name. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_groupby)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_groupby)] 此示例将返回一组嵌套的数据记录包含`Contact.LastName`列、 分组和按字母顺序排序的第一个字母`Contact.LastName`。This example returns a set of nested data records that contain the `Contact.LastName` column, grouped and sorted alphabetically by the first letter of `Contact.LastName`. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#projection_groupby)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_GroupBy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#projection_groupby)]

Public Function Include (path As String) As ObjectQuery(Of T)
public: System::Data::Objects::ObjectQuery<T> ^ Include(System::String ^ path);

param.name: path
param.span: 要在查询结果中返回的相关对象的列表（以点分隔）。

span.span: Dot-separated list of related objects to return in the query results.

summary.span: 指定要包括在查询结果中的相关对象。

span.span: Specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

returns.span: 一个新的 ，它具有定义的查询路径。

span.span: A new with the defined query path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查询路径可以用于 Entity SQL 和 LINQ 查询。Query paths can be used with Entity SQL and LINQ queries. 路径是完全内包含的。Paths are all-inclusive. 例如，如果一个包含调用指示`Include("Orders.OrderLines")`，不仅将`OrderLines`可以包括在内，而且也`Orders`。For example, if an include call indicates `Include("Orders.OrderLines")`, not only will `OrderLines` be included, but also `Orders`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 在调用 方法时，查询路径仅在 的返回实例上有效。When you call the method, the query path is only valid on the returned instance of the . 不影响 的其他实例和对象上下文本身。Other instances of and the object context itself are not affected. 因为 方法返回查询对象，所以可以对一个 多次调用此方法，从而为查询指定多个路径，如下面的示例所示：Because the method returns the query object, you can call this method multiple times on an to specify multiple paths for the query, as in the following example: [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SpanOnlyWithMultiplePaths](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#spanonlywithmultiplepaths)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SpanOnlyWithMultiplePaths](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#spanonlywithmultiplepaths)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithSpan](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#querywithspan)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithSpan](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#querywithspan)]

span.span: is .
is .

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于根据指定的 应用了 [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [INTERSECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/intersect-entity-sql.md) applied based on the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`query`定义结果以包括必须是同一类型的或与兼容的类型。The supplied `query` that defines results to include must be of the same type or of a type that is compatible with the . 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并实例。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 参数在组合后的 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 生成的查询从 实例（调用了它的 方法）继承连接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which the method was called. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此示例创建一个新的 对象，该对象包含两个其他查询的结果。This example creates a new object that contains the results of two other queries. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Intersect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_intersect)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Intersect](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_intersect)]

exception.span: 参数为 或空字符串。

span.span: The parameter is or is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Name { get; set; }
.property instance string Name
Public Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此对象查询的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this object query.

value.span: 一个 值，表示此 的名称。

span.span: A value that is the name of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造查询生成器方法时，对象查询的名称按名称确定序列中的当前对象查询。The name of the object query identifies the current object query in the sequence by name when constructing query builder methods. 默认情况下，查询名称是`it`。By default, the query name is `it`. 在 方法或 方法中引用联接中的当前序列时，这十分有用。This can be useful when referring to the current sequence in joins inside the method or in the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 当设置 的 属性时，该值成为后续方法中的别名。When you set the property of an , that value becomes the alias in successive methods. 属性的值必须以字母开头，可以包含字母、数字和下划线。The value of the property must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, and underscores. ## Examples 此示例将第一个 的名称设置为“product”，然后在后续 方法中使用此别名。This example sets the name of the first to "product" and then uses this alias in the successive method. 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithAliasNamed](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#querywithaliasnamed)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#QueryWithAliasNamed](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#querywithaliasnamed)]

span.span: The value specified on set is not valid.

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于应用了 [OFTYPE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/oftype-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于按特定实体或复杂类型筛选查询结果。 is used to filter query results by a specific entity or complex type. 这样可支持具有对象继承的概念模型。This supports a conceptual model with object inheritance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实体数据模型： 继承](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md)。For more information, see [Entity Data Model: Inheritance](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/entity-data-model-inheritance.md). 方法只能应用于的实体类型或复杂类型的 EDM 中定义。The method can only be applied to an of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the EDM.

span.span: The type specified is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嵌套查询中的结果排序无法得到保证。The ordering of results in a nested query cannot be guaranteed. 应始终作为序列中最后一个查询生成器方法。 should always be the final query builder method in the sequence. ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例创建一个新对象，其中包含现有查询排序依据的结果`ProductID`。The example creates a new object that contains the results of the existing query order by `ProductID`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用指定的映射`projection`参数。 applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter. 方法返回的 始终为行类型 。The returned by the method is always a row type of . 使用 方法可返回简单类型、实体类型或复杂类型的值。Use the method to return values that are simple types, entity types, or complex types. 有关详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md)。For more information, see [LINQ to Entities](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/linq-to-entities.md). 当投影中包括导航属性时，查询结果包括嵌套的 对象的集合。When a navigation property is included in the projection, the query results include a collection of nested objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用导航属性导航关系](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1d71c7d-16a7-4b46-96ac-690176bd5057)。For more information, see [How to: Navigate Relationships Using Navigation Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b1d71c7d-16a7-4b46-96ac-690176bd5057). ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例创建一个新其结果是包含的数据记录`ProductID`此查询的结果的字段。The example creates a new whose results are data records that contain the `ProductID` fields of the results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Select](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_select)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Select](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_select)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于返回简单类型、实体类型或复杂类型的值。 is used to return values that are simple types, entity types, or complex types. 方法用于需要行类型（而不是值类型）的投影。Use the method for projections that require a row type instead of a value type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象查询](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). 方法将应用指定的映射`projection`参数。The method applies the projection specified by the `projection` parameter. 方法返回的 必须具有与投影兼容的值类型，且必须具有与 的类型相同的类型。The returned by the method must be of a value type that is compatible with the projection and must be the same type as the type of . ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例创建一个新包含是的序列的结果`ProductID`从现有查询的结果中投影值。The example creates a new that contains results that are a sequence of `ProductID` values projected from the results of the existing query. returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于同时应用了 [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) 和 [SKIP](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/skip-entity-sql.md) 的原始实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不能在 方法之后使用。The method cannot be used after the method. 当你使用后，其工作方式像[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)子句的语句。When you use after , it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an clause. ## Examples 此示例将获取五个`Product`先跳过在查询结果中，按排序的前三个对象`Product.ListPrice`。This example gets five `Product` objects after skipping the first three in the query result, sorted by `Product.ListPrice`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非对查询进行排序，否则 具有不确定性。 is nondeterministic unless the query is sorted. 当你使用方法之后方法，其工作方式像[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)的语句[ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md)子句。When you use the method after the method, it functions like the [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) statement of an [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) clause. ## Examples 这些示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此示例创建一个新的 ，该对象包含现有查询的前两个结果。This example creates a new that contains the first two results of the existing query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Top](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_top)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Top](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_top)] 此示例将获取五个`Product`先跳过在查询结果中，按排序的前三个对象`Product.ListPrice`。This example gets five `Product` objects after skipping the first three in the query result, sorted by `Product.ListPrice`. 而不是使用[限制](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md)进行分页。 is used instead of [LIMIT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/limit-entity-sql.md) for paging. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_SkipLimit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#projection_skiplimit)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Projection_SkipLimit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#projection_skiplimit)]

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于应用了 [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) 来添加指定 的结果的原始实例。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [UNION](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) applied to add the results of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将所提供的结果添加`query`没有任何重复项。 adds the results of the supplied `query` without any duplicates. 提供`query`，它定义要添加必须的结果是相同类型或可以提升到此类型的类型。The supplied `query` that defines the results to add must be of the same type or of a type that can be promoted to the type of this . 例如，以下是有效因为`DiscontinuedProducts`可以提升为`Products`:For example, the following is valid because `DiscontinuedProducts` can be promoted to `Products`: ``` ObjectQuery.Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 以下将引发异常，因为`Products`不能提升为`DiscontinuedProducts`。The following will throw an exception because `Products` cannot be promoted to `DiscontinuedProducts`. ``` ObjectQuery .Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 有关类型的，这两个查询中的记录必须具有相同数量的列和类型的列中的传入`query`必须可提升为中的列的类型的.For an of type , the records in both queries must have the same number of columns, and the types in the columns of the of the passed `query` must be promotable to the types of the columns in the of the . 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并实例。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 参数在组合后的 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 生成的查询从 实例（调用了它的 ）继承连接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例使用 方法创建新的 对象。The example uses method to creates a new object. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_Union](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_union)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_Union](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_union)]

param.name: query
param.span: 一个 ，表示要添加的结果。

summary.span: 将查询结果与另一个对象查询的结果进行组合（包括所有重复项）。

span.span: Combines the results of the query with the results of another object query, including all duplicates.

returns.span: 新的 实例，等效于应用了 [UNION ALL](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) 来添加指定 的结果的原始实例。

span.span: A new instance that is equivalent to the original instance with [UNION ALL](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/union-entity-sql.md) applied to add the results of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将所提供的结果添加`query`包括所有重复项。 adds the results of the supplied `query` including all duplicates. 提供`query`用于定义要添加必须结果是相同类型或可以提升到此类型的类型。The supplied `query` that defines results to add must be of the same type or of a type that can be promoted to the type of this . 例如，以下是有效因为`DiscontinuedProducts`可以提升为`Products`:For example, the following is valid because `DiscontinuedProducts` can be promoted to `Products`: ``` ObjectQuery.Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 以下将引发异常，因为`Products`不能提升为`DiscontinuedProducts`。The following will throw an exception because `Products` cannot be promoted to `DiscontinuedProducts`. ``` ObjectQuery .Union(ObjectQuery) ``` 有关类型的，这两个查询中的记录必须具有相同数量的列和类型的列中的传入`query`必须可提升为中的列的类型的.For an of type , the records in both queries must have the same number of columns, and the types in the columns of the of the passed `query` must be promotable to the types of the columns in the of the . 定义的参数中提供`query`与在中定义的参数合并实例。Parameters that are defined in the supplied `query` are merged with parameters that are defined in the instance. 参数在组合后的 中必须是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the combined . 组合后的集合中不能有两个具有相同名称的参数。There cannot be two parameters in the combined collection with the same name. 有关详细信息，请参阅[查询生成器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). 生成的查询从 实例（调用了它的 ）继承连接。The resulting query inherits the connection from the instance on which was called. ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例使用 方法创建新的 对象。The example uses the method to create a new object. 然后对新的 对象调用 方法，以获取此查询的唯一结果。Then it calls the method on the new object to get the unique results of this query. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectquery_distinct_unionall)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectQuery_Distinct_UnionAll](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectquery_distinct_unionall)]

span.span: Limits the query to results that match specified filtering criteria.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 该示例创建一个新的 对象，该对象包含按条件 `"it.ProductID = 900"` 筛选的现有查询的结果。The example creates a new that contains results of the existing query filtered by the following criteria: `"it.ProductID = 900"`.
